mapper.select: select * from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pass=#{mem_pass}
mapper.insert: insert into member (mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_addr, mem_hp, mem_exit, mem_admin, mem_sit, mem_shop, mem_hair,mem_point,mem_black) values(#{mem_id},#{mem_pass},#{mem_name},#{mem_addr},#{mem_hp},1,1,1,1, 1,0,1)
